caption.title: Comparison of oceanic evaporation ( E ocean) trends during the two periods of 1957–1998 and 1999–2015.
caption.p: ( A) Time series of globally averaged oceanic evaporation. ( B) Spatial pattern on differences of oceanic evaporation trends between 1999–2015 and 1957–1998. Gray shaded area in (A) indicates ±1 SD. The inset in (B) shows the frequency distributions of the corresponding differences.
